definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Being a woman is synonymous with being a second-class citizen, in her opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在她看來，做女人是做二等公民的同義詞。

sentences.english: We should pay attention to synonym discrimination.
sentences.chinese: 我們應注意對同義詞的辨析。

sentences.english: Khiva's name became synonymous with cruelty and barbarity in contemporary Britain when, in 1842, two army officers, Colonel Charles Stoddart and Captain Arthur Conolly, were beheaded here in public.
sentences.chinese: 在當代英國，希瓦這個名字是殘暴和野蠻的同義詞。

sentences.english: Many programmers use these two terms, parameters and arguments, as synonyms.
sentences.chinese: 很多程序員把這兩個術語視爲同義字。

sentences.english: The semantic synonym expansion mechanism is limited to expand simple keyword queries.
sentences.chinese: 語義同義詞擴展機制僅限於擴展簡單的關鍵字查詢。

sentences.english: By default, assign a much smaller integer to all the synonyms.
sentences.chinese: 默認情況下，爲所有同義詞指定一個較小的整數。

sentences.english: In their minds, effort is synonymous with discomfort.
sentences.chinese: 在他們心目中，努力是不適的同義詞。

sentences.english: No wonder now zombies are synonymous with being Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 無怪乎“行屍走肉”成了中國人的定義同義語。

sentences.english: The word "bandwidth" is sometimes used synonymously with time, but it's really a different thing.
sentences.chinese: “帶寬”有時候也與時間同義，但其實是截然兩回事。

sentences.english: Eveningwear is practically synonymous with sexy.
sentences.chinese: 晚裝似乎就是性感的同義詞。

sentences.english: The statement He is brave or he is not brave is a tautology .
sentences.chinese: “他勇敢或他並非不勇敢”是一種同義反復。

sentences.english: Network marketing is synonymously referred to as Multi-Level-Marketing or MLM.
sentences.chinese: 網絡營銷是同義詞稱爲多層次營銷還是傳銷。

sentences.english: Synonyms can have slightly different connotations.
sentences.chinese: 同義詞之間的內涵意義會略微不同。

sentences.english: The words "partition" and "group" are used synonymously here.
sentences.chinese: 在此“劃分”和“分組”用作同義詞。

sentences.english: This restricts the size of each synonym to this maximum size.
sentences.chinese: 這將約束每個同義詞的最大大小。

sentences.english: The synonymous reduplication is a unique linguistic phenomenon in Korean.
sentences.chinese: 同義疊加是朝鮮語特有的一種語言現象。

definition: Nêdong county, Tibetan: Sne gdong rdzong, in Lhokha prefecture 山南地區|山南地区[Shan1 nan2 di4 qu1], Tibet
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
character size/font size/fame/reputation/shop/name of a shop
characters and numbers (as used in a code)/alphanumeric code/serial number
standard form (of a Chinese character)/plain font style (as opposed to bold or italic)/printed style (as opposed to cursive)/(Tw) traditional (i.e. unsimplified) characters
to impair/to degrade/to decrease/to reduce/to weaken/to detract from/impairment (e.g. of financial assets)
Yang Zhu (c. 440-360 BC), Chinese philosopher advocating ethical egoism
